item.title:
The Feynman-technique of learning:
> Pick a topic you wanna understand and start studying it > Pretend to teach the topic to a classroom > Go back to the books when you get stuck > Simplify and use analogies!
• If you wanna master something, teach it. 🧠
item.description:
The Feynman-technique of learning:

• If you wanna master something, teach it. 🧠
item.content:encoded: The Feynman-technique of learning: > Pick a topic you wanna understand and start studying it > Pretend to teach the topic to a classroom > Go back to the books when you get stuck > Simplify and use analogies! • If you wanna master something, teach it. 🧠
